synopsis.text: When his mentor, a formidable martial artist, falls victim to betrayal and meets an untimely end, Gang Yong vows to exact revenge on the traitors. After honing his martial arts skills in isolation, he embarks on a mission to track down the culprits. However, upon arrival in town, he is taken aback to find that they have already met their demise. With his original plan foiled, Gang Yong must navigate this unexpected turn of events. As a cover, he assumes the unassuming role of a chubby dumpling delivery boy, leaving us wondering what his next move will be.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
